name: Spectral Blade
overview: Spectral Blade is an RPG game that as all the games (as Suna no Enbrace) made by Idea Factory takes place in the Neverland fantasy world. The player takes the role of a member of the Imperial army that got the mission of destroy the monsters that are on a dungeon and are send by an evil master. When he reached the dungeon he noticed that the fate of the World maybe will depend of the success of his quest, but he's lucky that he will not have to complete the mission on his own since he will have the help of other heroes that wants to stop that evil army. The gameplay is the classic in an RPG game since to advance in the game the player has to travel around different places defeating the random battle enemies and the usual main level bosses. The battles are turn based, the player select an action for his character and the enemy will attack him once per turn.
